Item.description:
A vector of data collected by network monitoring
Belongs to a Device or Interface

https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/3.4/manual/api/reference/item

metricType.description:
Type of Metric / Metric collection source
Zabbix - [[Item.type]]

valueType.description:
Type of value the metric provides
Zabbix - [[Item.value_type]]

error.description:
Error text if there are problems updating the item
Zabbix - [[Item.error]]

history.description:
A time unit of how long the history should be stored. Also accepts user macro
Zabbix - [[Item.history]]

lastValue.description:
Last value of the metric
Zabbix - [[Item.lastvalue]]

isSupported.description:
Whether or not the metric is supported by Zabbix
Zabbix - [[Item.State]]

units.description:
Units the Metric value is measured in
Zabbix - [[Item.units]]

delay.description:
Updatnterval of the item. Accepts seconds or time
unit with suffix and with or without one or more custom
intervals that consist of either flexible intervals and
scheduling intervals as serialized strings. Also accepts
user macros. Flexible intervals could be written as two
macros separated by a forward slash. Intervals are
separated by a semicolon.
Optional for Zabbix trapper or Dependent iteme interval
of the item. Accepts seconds or time unit with suffix
and with or without one or more custom intervals that
consist of either flexible intervals and scheduling
intervals as serialized strings. Also accepts user macros.
Flexible intervals could be written as two macros separated
by a forward slash. Intervals are separated by a semicolon.
Zabbix - [[Item.delay]]

historys.description: Metric data obtained through the Zabbix [[History]] API

historys.description: Metric data obtained through the Zabbix [[History]] API

internalName.description:
Technical Name - set by the NOC or the device itself
Zabbix - [[Host.host]]

displayName.description:
Visible Name - set by the application user
Zabbix - [[Host.name]]

serialNumberA.description:
Primary Serial Number of the device
Zabbix - [[HostInventory.serialno_a]]

serialNumberB.description:
Secondary Serial Number of the device
Zabbix - [[HostInventory.serialno_b]]

hardware.description:
Physical hardware the device is running
Zabbix - [[HostInventory.hardware]]

contact.description:
Point of contact for the device
Zabbix - [[HostInventory.contact]]

model.description:
Model number or Model Name of the device
Zabbix - [[HostInventory.model]]

locationDescription.description:
Location description reported by the device
Zabbix - [[HostInventory.location]]

isBillable.description: Whether to enable Network Assure billing for the Device

SupportCase.description: Represents a Support Case object in Salesforce

error.description:
Error text if there are problems sending a message or running a command
Zabbix - [[Alert.error]]

message.description:
Message text used for alerts
Zabbix - [[Alert.message]]

retries.description:
Number of times zabbix tried to resend the message
Zabbix - [[Alert.retries]]

sendTo.description:
Address, user Name or other identifier of the recipient. Used for message alerts.
Zabbix - [[Alert.sendto]]

subject.description:
Message Subject. Used for message alerts.
Zabbix - [[Alert.Subject]]

info.description: This is the backend for Affiniti's Network Assure.
info.title: Network Assure REST API
